label: specifiedTradeSettlement
comment: A line trade settlement specified for this supply chain trade line item.
A trade settlement payment specified for this trade settlement payment.
A trade settlement specified for this subordinate trade line item.

rangeIncludes.comment: The information, at a line level, that enables the reconciliation of a financial transaction with the item(s) that the financial transaction is intended to settle, for example a commercial invoice.

domainIncludes.comment: A collection of information specific to an item being used or reported on for trade purposes.
The specific discharge obligations in respect of funds or securities transferred between two or more parties as part of a trade settlement.
